notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Data cannot be shared publicly because they contain sensitive patient information, as all women are HIV-positive and suffering from perinatal depression. Furthermore, in our informed consent forms, it says “We will not share the information you give us with anyone not involved in the study.” The ethics committee that imposes this the National Health Sciences Research Committee in Malawi, as we used their informed consent forms. The committee can be reached at: Tel: +265 1 726 422/418 or Email: mohdoccentre@nhsrc-mw.com.
